name: Baboon Lagoon
description:
Join Dalbert Paine, an unlikely hero, in a perilous quest to unveil the secrets of the Legendary Treasure of Baboon Lagoon. At least, if you can make it out alive from the clutches of the evil pirate captain and his goons...

Features

  • Amazing rich storyline with over 6 minutes of gameplay and five all original characters. One of them is totally not a chicken.
  • Puzzles and comedy following in the footsteps of the good ol' point-and-click adventure games from LucasArts and Sierra.
  • Fully voice acted with more than 150 original voice lines! (Or semi-fully anyway. We misplaced some of our sound bites. Sorry!!)
  • Tons of replayability with complex dialogue options and characters. Solving puzzles has never been this much fun! Or this jam-packed with gags and easter eggs... Who even wants to escape from a murderous pirate if you haven't first heard all of the jokes!
  • This game was created by five students of Hive Helsinki during the duration of Global Game Jam 2022 but was not an official entry in the event.

Controls
Z key / Enter key / Space key: Confirm / Interact with objects / Use the stairs
X key: Cancel
WASD/Arrow keys: Move
